events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because I don't need this product.
The system has categorized the customer issue as Refund based on keywords related to money back and returns.
Assigning a customer support agent to handle the refund request for the incorrect item received.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund due to receiving the wrong item.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund?
Here is my order number 457893 and I have attached a clear photo showing the wrong product that arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund right away and send you a prepaid return label to send the incorrect item back.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the refund and the return shipping label provided.
The refund has been processed to your original payment method, and the return label has been sent to your email.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and the return process is going smoothly.
Yes, I received the refund and sent the item back today. Thanks again for the excellent help!
We are closing your case now. Thank you for your cooperation, and please feel free to contact us if you need anything else.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to your email to help us improve our service based on your feedback.
